duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative guidance on privacy controls, mechanisms, and protocols across the organization and product lines.
Oversee the architecture and design of privacy controls and implement privacy capabilities, patterns, and policies into products.
Analyze and audit data to ensure privacy requirements are met and build relationships with technical and compliance teams for privacy-by-design controls.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a similar technical field (Master's preferred)
Certifications related to privacy, such as CIPP, CIPT, or CIPM
Regulatory knowledge of GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA, NYDFS
